data.title: THE OCCITAN NOTEBOOKS N° 1, February 1899-N° 2, August 1…
data.meta_description:
THE OCCITAN NOTEBOOKS
N° 1, February 1899-N° 2, August 1899.
Paris, Published under the auspices of the Action Committee of the "Ligue Occitane": J. Charles-Brun, Émile Escande, Henri Ner, Johannès Plantadis, Paul-Redonnel. Manager: Émile Laborde. Texts by Maurice Barrès, J. Charles-Brun, Paul-Redonnel, Han Ryner, with letters from Léon Daudet, Batisto Bonnet and Paul-Redonnel. Complete collection. 2 numbers in 2 issues in 1 vol. in-8 bound. One of the 7 ex. on simili Japon. Joint : - Photo postcard of Maurice Barrès.
